title: Today the US is practically... quote - situation

content.description: “Today the United States is practically sovereign on this continent and its fiat is law upon the subjects to which it confines its interposition.”
content.question: Secretary of State Richard Olney, note to Great Britain, 1895 The quote above is an interpretation of the

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Identify  a source's point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience.
